title: Resignations in GA House add to year of special elections in the state
shortDescription: Political resignations have led to multiple special elections being scheduled in Georgia this year on top of midterms in November. Watch these races.

title: Trump looks to 'ban' large-scale investors from buying homes
shortDescription: President Trump said he's preparing measures to ban large-scale institutional investors from buying single-family homes to lower housing costs.

title: Venezuelan oil will arrive 'very soon' in US, White House says
shortDescription: Millions of barrels of Venezuelan oil that couldn't previously be sold because of US sanctions will begin arriving 'very soon,' the White House said.

title: Controversial national park passes with Trump photo go on sale
shortDescription: Critics are buying stickers to cover up the president's face, which could void their pass.

title: Trump won't say 'cancel the election,' he mentions unprompted
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke to House Republicans as the party braces for impact in the 2026 midterms. He teased he can't cancel the election.

title: Trump's Greenland options examined. How the saga could play out
shortDescription: The Trump administration insists it will "get" Greenland. No, it won't, says Denmark. What now?

title: Trump meeting with US oil executives amid push on Venezuelan oil
shortDescription: Trump wants U.S. companies to invest in Venezuela, which could be complicated by political instability and a history of oil industry state control.

title: Trump energy chief says he wants 'leverage' over Venezuela through oil
shortDescription: The Energy secretary explained President Donald Trump's plan to "indefinitely" control Venezuela's oil supply.

title: Trump weighs military use in Greenland bid
shortDescription: The White House confirmed President Donald Trump is weighing potential military options as part of a renewed effort to acquire Greenland.

title: See Kai Trump play golf and her life with the first family
shortDescription: See Kai Madison Trump, daughter of Donald Jr. and Vanessa Trump, who lives in Florida, plays golf, and will attend University of Miami in fall 2026.

title: Trump: Venezuela to give US 50 million oil barrels
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Venezuela will transfer 30 to 50 million barrels of oil to the U.S. after Nicolás Maduro’s capture.

title: Trump’s Venezuela plan risks cost-of-living message ahead of midterms
shortDescription: President Trump's focus on Venezuela's and push to expand America's reach steers him further from America's top concern: the economy.

title: Would US use force to take Greenland? White House says it's 'always an option'
shortDescription: The Trump administration has reignited threats against the Danish territory and refused to rule out military force, according to a White House statement.

title: Trump freezes $10B in child care, family funds in 5 states. See where.
shortDescription: The Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) is freezing the funds citing what it called concerns about fraud and misuse.

title: Trump says Venezuela to provide up to 50 million barrels of oil to US
shortDescription: "This Oil will be sold at its Market Price, and that money will be controlled by me, as President of the United States of America," Trump said.

title: Trumps says his wife does not like him dancing
shortDescription: President Trump says First Lady Melania is not a fan of his dancing and mimicry, allegedly calling it "unpresidential."

title: Kelly vows to fight for First Amendment amid Pentagon threats
shortDescription: Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth announced Kelly's censure on Jan. 5, months after the lawmaker said service members 'can refuse illegal orders.'

title: Trump tries to reshape J6 narrative as Dems issue anniversary warning
shortDescription: The five-year anniversary of the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot saw the Trump White House and Democrats battle over the narrative around the event.
